name: ProtoFluent
description:
ProtoFluent is a top-down space shooter where you can choose and modify your own ships and go on adventures throughout the galaxy. It is a prototype of Fluent, currently in development. 

Features:

  • Shoot enemy pirates with pulse lasers, rapid fire lasers, beam weapons, or homing missiles
  • Equip your ship with items such as shields, cloaking devices, warp drives, plate armor, and (currently) a few more!
  • Travel across the galaxy with your handy-dandy galactic holo-map
  • Mine minerals from asteroid fields!
  • Random Galaxy, Solar System, and Planet generation!
  • Land on planets and walk around!
